left(double) - Method in class mcm.graphics.Body
Changes movement direction by turning angle degrees to the left.
line(double) - Method in class mcm.theater.Actor
Jump the given distance from the current position in the current movement direction and always leaves a trail along the jumped distance.
LineShape - Class in mcm.graphics
A line shape.

Constructs a line with the slope deltay / deltax.
lineTo(double, double) - Method in class mcm.theater.Actor
Sets the body's position to point (tox, toy) and always leaves a trail along the jumped distance.
lineTo(Point) - Method in class mcm.theater.Actor
Sets the body's position to the given point and always leaves a trail along the jumped distance.
